cms.query.QueryText:
--DECLARE @ChatUserID INT --SET @ChatUserID = 398 --DECLARE @SiteID INT --SET @SiteID = 4
SELECT CSCR.* FROM Chat_SupportCannedResponse AS CSCR WHERE CSCR.ChatSupportCannedResponseChatUserID = @ChatUserID OR (CSCR.ChatSupportCannedResponseChatUserID IS NULL AND (CSCR.ChatSupportCannedResponseSiteID IS NULL OR CSCR.ChatSupportCannedResponseSiteID = @SiteID))
